Package com.mozilla.secops.authprofile

Pipeline for authentication source profiling and alerting

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthProfile.AuthProfileOptions
    Runtime options for AuthProfile pipeline.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthProfile
    AuthProfile implements analysis of normalized authentication events
    AuthProfile.ExtractIdentity
    Extract subject user for each event in input PCollection
    AuthProfile.Parse
    Parse input strings returning applicable authentication events.
    AuthProfile.StateAnalyze
    Analyze grouped events associated with a particular user or identity against persistent user state
    AwsAssumeRoleCorrelator
    Analyze cross account assumeRole events and correlates between the trusting account (the account a role is being assumed in) and the trusted account (the account with the iam user assuming a role).
    AwsAssumeRoleCorrelator.CrossAccountAssumeRoleFilter
    Returns only AssumeRole events with a sharedEventID indicating there's events across two accounts that need to be correlated
    CritObjectAnalyze
    Analysis for authentication involving critical objects
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthProfile.StateAnalyze.ActionType
    The outcome of state analysis can result in various actions being taken.

Package com.mozilla.secops.authprofile Description

Pipeline for authentication source profiling and alerting
